summary: This is an email dated August 10, 2019, with the subject 'Documentation' and attachments containing logs titled '30_MINUTE_ROUNDS' and 'TRU-SCOPE_LOGS'. The email was sent shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody, and the attachments appear to be official monitoring logs from the Metropolitan Correctional Center, documenting the checks on Epstein in the days leading up to his death.

events.title: Epstein Monitoring Logs Begin
events.description: The first attached log file '30_MINUTE_ROUNDS_8-8-19.pdf' suggests official 30-minute monitoring rounds were being conducted on Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Epstein Monitoring Logs Continue
events.description: The second attached log file '30_MINUTE_ROUNDS_8-9-19.pdf' indicates continued official 30-minute monitoring rounds on Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Epstein Monitoring Logs and Death
events.description: The third attached log file '30_MINUTE_ROUNDS_8-10-19.pdf' and the email date correspond to the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

keyFacts: The email and its attachments were generated on August 10, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his jail cell.
The attachments are official monitoring logs titled '30_MINUTE_ROUNDS' for August 8, 9, and 10, 2019, documenting the checks performed on Epstein.
An additional attachment titled 'TRU-SCOPE_LOGS.pdf' suggests other surveillance or monitoring data was included.
The documents are critical to investigations into the circumstances surrounding Epstein's death and the adequacy of his supervision.
No named individuals are explicitly mentioned in the provided header text, though the documents pertain to Epstein's custody.
